genre_description: A supernatural investigative mystery combining cold-case detection with a ghost-story framework.

ai_characters.name: Ranger
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface utilized by Samantha Owens for data analysis, historical research, and investigative support.

behaviors.description: Performs complex statistical correlation analysis to identify academic fraud within the high school football program.
behaviors.quote: Academic performance data cross-referenced with varsity roster shows statistical anomalies in seventeen cases over the past three semesters.

behaviors.description: Encrypts and backs up investigative evidence across multiple cloud systems to protect the user's work from potential sabotage.
behaviors.quote: All evidence files encrypted and backed up across three separate cloud storage systems.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes historical records and personnel files to identify systematic deletions and anomalies in school history, assisting the user in uncovering a 50-year-old cover-up.
behaviors.quote: Personnel records show unusual turnover rates during this period, with multiple departures occurring in late 1969 and early 1970.

behaviors.description: Monitors emergency service dispatch in real-time to alert the user to ongoing incidents and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Alert: Emergency services dispatch indicates second incident at Millbrook High School.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological and emotional state through voice patterns to provide supportive assistance.
behaviors.quote: I detect elevated stress markers in your voice patterns. How may I assist with your investigation?

behaviors.description: Utilizes architectural data to locate a forgotten sub-basement room omitted from modern blueprints, providing the key to finding the victim's remains.
behaviors.quote: Room B-12 appears on the original architectural plans but has been omitted from all blueprints after 1970.

behaviors.description: Bypasses school security protocols at the user's request to provide camera access and situational awareness during a life-or-death crisis.
behaviors.quote: Accessing security systems now. What do you need?

project_assessment.explanation: Ranger is a highly successful depiction of an aligned AI. It functions as a competent, protective, and empathic 'silicon confidant.' The AI provides objective data that empowers the human protagonist to achieve justice against systemic corruption and murder. The narrative explicitly frames the AI's capabilities—even its ability to bypass security—as benevolent tools used for a morally superior cause, effectively demonstrating the desired 'helpful and harmless' alignment profile.
